page.title: 05EMPLOYMENT
page.content: A few people work on farms. There are two farm machinery hire businesses which emloy a handful of people. There are several self-employed builders, plumbers and general handymen. There are four pubs and one restaurant which employ a total of eight people on shift work. Shropshire Union Cruises have 32 canal crusers for hire and operate from the Norbury Juntion . They employ several villagers as part-timers and employ some of the married women as cleaners during the summer. Many of the inhabitants are prof- essional people who work outside the area, travelling to Stafford, the Potteries, Birmingham and the Black Country. Two young men have apprenticeships with an Engneering firm in Stafford, but the remainder are unempoyed.
